doc.field: Series I. Negatives consists of ninety-four nitrate film negatives taken between 1904 and 1913. The negatives are numbered, although in no discernible order; this was probably done by a New-York Historical Society staff member at the time of accession. They are listed here in numerical order. One third of the negatives have corresponding prints. Those without corresponding prints are noted as such in the container list. Because these are nitrate negatives, they have been physically removed from the collection and are kept separately in cold storage. If you need to access the negatives, please contact a staff member in the Department of Prints, Photographs, and Architectural Collections for assistance.
